aksoy.cipher

Class MonoAlphabeticCipher

  • java.lang.Object
    • aksoy.cipher.MonoAlphabeticCipher
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cipher
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    KeywordCipher, ShiftCipher, SubstitutionCipher

    public class MonoAlphabeticCipher
extends java.lang.Object
implements Cipher
    MonoAlphabeticCipher is the class that contains the basic functionalities like encryption and decryption and the changing of the secret alphabet.
    Version:
    10-10-2018
    Author:
    Melih Aksoy
